    Represents an applicant in the housing application system.

    B

    bookingFlat(HDBOfficer) - Static method in class ApplicationManager
    Allows an HDBOfficer to book a flat for an applicant whose application has been approved.

    C

    Changes the password of the user and updates it in the provided user data map.

    Retrieves the map corresponding to a specific user role from the nested map.
    close() - Method in class Input
    Closes the underlying Scanner object.
    combinedHashmap(HashMap<String, List<String>>, HashMap<String, List<String>>, HashMap<String, List<String>>) - Static method in class UserDatabase
    Combines individual role-based user maps into a nested map, allowing easy access based on user roles.
    create_object_lists(HashMap<String, HashMap<String, List<String>>>) - Static method in class UserManager
    Creates user objects (Applicant, HDBOfficer, HDBManager) from the provided nested user data map, and stores them in the corresponding lists.
    createProject(HDBManager) - Static method in class ProjectManager
    Creates a new housing project with user input and assigns it to the given manager.

    deleteProject(HDBManager) - Static method in class ProjectManager
    Deletes the current project being managed and removes it from all project lists.
    delProjListItem(Project) - Method in class HDBManager
    Removes a project from this manager's list of projects.

    EnquiryManager() - Constructor for class EnquiryManager
     
    excelToHashmap(String) - Static method in class ProjectDatabase
    Reads data from an Excel file at the specified filepath, parses it into structured Project objects, and categorizes them into active, inactive, and expired based on their open/close dates.
    excelToHashmap(String) - Static method in class UserDatabase
    Reads an Excel file (.xlsx) and converts the data into a HashMap.

    H

    HDBManager - Class in Unnamed Package
    Represents an HDB Manager in the BTO booking system.
    HDBManager(String, String, String, HashMap<String, List<String>>) - Constructor for class HDBManager
    Constructs a new HDBManager object using data from the provided user data map.
    HDBManagerDisplay - Class in Unnamed Package
    This class handles the user interface for the HDBManager, displaying options for the manager to interact with and manage their HDB projects, applications, enquiries, and other related operations.
    HDBManagerDisplay() - Constructor for class HDBManagerDisplay
     
    HDBOfficer - Class in Unnamed Package
    The HDBOfficer class represents an officer who is responsible for managing a specific project and tracking the status of their application (successful or failed).
    HDBOfficer(String, String, String, HashMap<String, List<String>>) - Constructor for class HDBOfficer
    Constructs a new HDBOfficer with the specified NRIC, password, role, and a map of correct data.
    HDBOfficerDisplay - Class in Unnamed Package
    The HDBOfficerDisplay class provides an interactive interface for HDB Officers to perform tasks based on their registration status, project handling responsibilities, and application involvement.
    HDBOfficerDisplay() - Constructor for class HDBOfficerDisplay
     

    I

    Input - Class in Unnamed Package
    The Input class provides utility methods for reading validated input from the user via the console.
    Input() - Constructor for class Input
    Constructs a new Input instance using System.in.

    L

    listApplicants(HDBManager) - Static method in class ApplicationManager
    Lists all applicants who have submitted an application for a particular project managed by the given HDBManager.

    Verifies the login credentials against the provided dataset.

    N

    newApplication(Applicant) - Static method in class ApplicationManager
    Allows an applicant to apply for a visible housing project based on their eligibility.
    newApplication(HDBOfficer) - Static method in class ApplicationManager
    Allows an HDBOfficer to apply for a housing project that they are not managing, based on their eligibility.

    P

    printLocations() - Static method in class ProjectManager
     
    printReceipt(HDBOfficer) - Static method in class ApplicationManager
    Prints a receipt for all applicants with successful applications for the project managed by the given officer.
    processApplication(HDBManager) - Static method in class ApplicationManager
    Allows an HDBManager to approve or reject an application for a specific project once the application window has closed (i.e., project visibility is false).
    processOfficerRegistration(HDBManager) - Static method in class ProjectManager
    Processes pending officer registration requests by approving or rejecting them.
    processWithdrawApplication(HDBManager) - Static method in class ApplicationManager
    Allows an HDBManager to process withdrawal requests for a specific project.
    Project - Class in Unnamed Package
    Represents a public housing project managed by HDB.
    Project(String, String, int, int, int, int, LocalDate, LocalDate, HDBManager, int) - Constructor for class Project
    Constructs a new Project with the specified attributes.
    ProjectDatabase - Class in Unnamed Package
    The ProjectDatabase class is responsible for reading project data from an Excel spreadsheet, converting that data into Project objects, and populating the ProjectManager with categorized lists of active, inactive, and expired projects.
    ProjectDatabase() - Constructor for class ProjectDatabase
     
    ProjectManager - Class in Unnamed Package
    The ProjectManager class handles the creation, management, and processing of HDB housing projects, including project registrations, filtering, editing, and deletion.
    ProjectManager() - Constructor for class ProjectManager
    Constructs a new ProjectManager with empty project lists.

    U

    updateVisibility() - Method in class Project
    Updates the visibility status based on current date, opening date, and closing date.
    User - Class in Unnamed Package
    The User class serves as a superclass for all user types in the system, including Applicants, HDB Officers, and HDB Managers.
    User(String, String, String) - Constructor for class User
    Constructs a User with only NRIC, password, and role.
    User(String, String, String, HashMap<String, List<String>>) - Constructor for class User
    Constructs a fully initialized User using details from a role-specific map.
    UserDatabase - Class in Unnamed Package
    The UserDatabase class provides utility methods to load user data from Excel spreadsheets and convert them into structured HashMap formats for use in the application.
    UserDatabase() - Constructor for class UserDatabase
     
    UserManager - Class in Unnamed Package
    The UserManager class manages collections of all user objects (Applicants, HDB Officers, and HDB Managers) loaded from external Excel data sources.
    UserManager() - Constructor for class UserManager
     

    V

    viewAllProject(Filter) - Static method in class ProjectManager
    Displays all available projects filtered by the specified criteria.
    viewEnquiries(Applicant) - Method in interface EnquiryInterface
    Displays the list of enquiries made by the applicant.
    viewEnquiries(Applicant) - Method in class EnquiryManager
    Allows an applicant to view all their submitted enquiries.
    viewEnquiries(HDBManager) - Method in interface EnquiryInterface
    Displays the list of all enquiries for an HDB Manager to view.
    viewEnquiries(HDBManager) - Method in class EnquiryManager
    Allows an HDB Manager to view enquiries from either all projects or only their assigned projects.
    viewEnquiries(HDBOfficer) - Method in interface EnquiryInterface
    Displays the list of all enquiries for an HDB Officer to view.
    viewEnquiries(HDBOfficer) - Method in class EnquiryManager
    Allows an HDB Officer to view all enquiries related to their assigned project.
    viewOfficerRegistration(HDBManager) - Static method in class ProjectManager
    Displays all pending officer registration requests for the manager's project.
    viewOwnProject(HDBManager, Filter) - Static method in class ProjectManager
    Displays projects created by the manager, filtered by the specified criteria.
    viewProjectDetails(HDBOfficer) - Static method in class ProjectManager
    Displays full project details of the project an HDB officer is currently managing.
